name: Blaze · Make your own choices
description:
Throw yourself into a world of wild adventures, and make your own choices!
You can choose to be nice or be the world’s biggest scumbag — you get to decide.
Fun and laughter guaranteed ;)

This app contains subscription :
- You can subscribe for this app to get access to premium features and unlimited content
- Subscription options are: 1-week with 3-day trial, 1-month, 1-year
